meta.title: Illumina 1 — Seeds
meta.notes: Weeks roll every 7 days (6 seeds × 7 = 42). Customize by day later as needed.

weeks.cue: Speak the thing — one brave, kind outbound note.
Sweeten one interaction — add warmth, play, or thanks.
Show your work — share one small draft with someone.
Orient — step outside, look up; pick a star as your north.
Move for one song — let the body lead the mind.
Draw a boundary — say no to one non‑essential thing.
